description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. 3d Space dogfighting brought to the Xbox 360. Practice offline then take the fight online in either System link or fight the world on Xbox Live. 4 unique Powerups and 3 different weapons are your tools to prove you are the greatest pilot of all time!
